text: Harla, known as Umm Anmar was a woman of the Banū Khuza'āh clan that met the Ṣaḥābah of Muḥammad. She bought the slave Khabāb ibn al-Aratt. She and her brother Sibaā'ah ibn 'Abd al-'Uzzā tortured Khabbāb ibn al-Aratt. She married Zuhayr ibn Abdul-As'ad. By whom, she had a son Anmar. Category:Arab women
title: Umm Anmaar
